title: EBSI Verifiable Accreditation Record
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Accreditation

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Accreditation

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the Verifiable Attestation

reservedAttributeId.description: Defines the attributeId this Verifiable Accreditation has been created for

accreditedFor.description: Defines a list of claims that define/determine the authorisation of an Issuer to issue certain types of VCs

schemaId.description: Schema, registered in Trusted  Schemas Registry, which the accredited organisation is allowed to issue, as per their accreditation

anyOf.description: Defines the jurisdiction for which the accreditation is valid
Defines the jurisdictions for which the accreditation is valid

credentialStatus.description: Defines revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status
